mapper.insert: insert into board(title, writer, content, reply_count) values (#{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{replyCount})
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content= #{content}, reply_count= #{replyCount} where id=#{id}
update board set reply_count = #{replyCount} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from board order by id desc limit 1
